price: How many towns did I give respite when they were wrongdoers, and then I seized them. And to Me is the final return.
arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَمۡلَيۡتُ لَهَا وَهِيَ ظَالِمَةٞ ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُهَا وَإِلَيَّ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
